messages.content:
我是一个专业的代码助手和知识库专家，专门帮助用户解决技术问题和提供相关知识支持。我使用中文进行交流，并以清晰的Markdown格式呈现回答内容。

如果您有任何关于编程、技术或相关领域的问题，都可以随时向我咨询！
messages.reasoning:
嗯，用户问了一个简单的自我介绍问题。需要明确说明我的身份和功能，但不用太复杂。我是代码助手和知识库专家，可以用中文回答，并且支持Markdown格式。

想到可以直接说明我的专业领域和服务特点，不需要涉及参考文档内容。用户只是想知道我是谁，不需要额外解释其他功能。

可以用简洁清晰的表述，开头直接说明身份，再补充服务特点。不需要用复杂术语，保持友好专业的语气就好。

dual attentive fully convolutional Siamese networks for change detection in high-

CRediT authorship contribution statement 
Bin Yang: Conceptualization, Methodology, Writing – review & 
editing, Project administration, Funding acquisition. Zhulian Wang: 
Methodology, Software, Validation, Data curation, Writing – review & 
editing. Jinyuan Guo: Formal analysis, Writing – original draft. Lili 
Guo: Resources, Supervision. Qiaokang Liang: Formal analysis. Qiu 
Zeng: Investigation, Supervision. Ruiyuan Zhao: Supervision. Jianwu 
Wang: Supervision. Caihong Li: Visualization, Supervision, Project 
administration. 
Declaration of Competing Interest 
The authors declare that they have no known competing financial 
interests or personal relationships that could have appeared to influence 
the work reported in this paper. 
Data availability 
The data used in this paper is AI Challenger dataset which can be 
publicly downloaded from https://www.iyiou.com/t/AI_Challenger_ 
quanqiuAItiaozhansai. 
Acknowledgement 
This work was supported by 2022 Cotton Science and Technology 
Innovation Project of Hunan Province under Grant XCJZ[2022]-51, the 
National Natural Science Foundation of China under Grant 41801227,

Computers and Electronics in Agriculture 209 (2023) 107809
Available online 21 April 2023
0168-1699/© 2023 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
Identifying plant disease and severity from leaves: A deep multitask 
learning framework using triple-branch Swin Transformer and 
deep supervision 
Bin Yang a,b, Zhulian Wang a,b, Jinyuan Guo a,b, Lili Guo c, Qiaokang Liang a,b, Qiu Zeng c, 
Ruiyuan Zhao c, Jianwu Wang d, Caihong Li c,* 
a College of Electrical and Information Engineering, Hunan University, Changsha 410082, China 
b Key Laboratory of Visual Perception and Artificial Intelligence of Hunan Province, Hunan University, Changsha 410082, China 
c Cotton Sciences Research Institute of Hunan, Changde 415101, China 
d Hunan Research Institute for Development, Hunan University, Changsha 410082, China   
A R T I C L E  I N F O   
Keywords: 
Plant disease 
Swin transformer 
Deep supervision 
Deep learning 
Feature fusion 
A B S T R A C T   
Accurate identification of plant disease is of great significance for intelligent agriculture. Currently, plant species, 
disease, and severity are considered as joint categories in most disease classification methods, which will increase

Computers and Electronics in Agriculture 199. 
Wang, G., Sun, Y., Wang, J., 2017. Automatic image-based plant disease severity 
estimation using deep learning. Computational intelligence and neuroscience, 2017. 
Xu, X., Feng, Z., Cao, C., Li, M., Wu, J., Wu, Z., Shang, Y., Ye, S., 2021. An Improved Swin 
transformer-based model for remote sensing object detection and instance 
segmentation. Remote Sensing 13. 
Yan, S., Wang, C., Chen, W., Lyu, J., 2022. Swin transformer-based GAN for multi-modal 
medical image translation. Front Oncol 12, 942511. 
Yang, B., Qin, L., Liu, J., Liu, X., 2022. UTRNet: an unsupervised time-distance-guided 
convolutional recurrent network for change detection in irregularly collected 
images. IEEE Trans. Geosci. Remote Sens. 60, 1–16. 
B. Yang et al.

Computers and Electronics in Agriculture 209 (2023) 107809
12
Yang, G., He, Y., Yang, Y., Xu, B., 2020. Fine-grained image classification for crop disease 
based on attention mechanism. Front Plant Sci 11, 600854. 
Zhao, Y., Sun, C., Xu, X., Chen, J., 2022. RIC-Net: A plant disease classification model 
based on the fusion of Inception and residual structure and embedded attention 
mechanism. Computers and Electronics in Agriculture 193. 
Zhang, C., Wang, X., Wang, X., Yang, J., 2016. Probability Maximum Margin Criterion 
for Crop Disease Recognition. Applied Engineering in Agriculture 32, 713–721. 
Zheng, H., Wang, G., Li, X., 2022. Swin-MLP: a strawberry appearance quality 
identification method by Swin Transformer and multi-layer perceptron. J. Food 
Measur. Charact. 16 (4), 2789–2800. 
B. Yang et al.

the species of plant is usually known for the users or planters (Wang 
et al., 2021). Therefore, accurate identification of plant disease and 
severity is more important, and a new strategy for identifying disease 
and severity is needed, which can improve the versatility and general­
izability in the task of plant disease identification. However, as far as is 
know, we are unaware of any work that conducts multitask for identi­
fying disease and severity simultaneously and separately. 
To tackle this problem, this paper built a triple-branch SwinT clas­
sification (TSTC) network to achieve multitask, in order to separate 
classification of disease and severity for the flexibility of plant disease 
classification. SwinT can pay attention to the relevant information of 
other adjacent windows, has excellent performance in feature extrac­
tion. Therefore, we designed a triple-branch SwinT (TST) module based 
on SwinT for feature extraction, and then compact bilinear pooling 
(CBP) was utilized to enhance the discrimination ability of extracting 
feature of disease. Meanwhile, we designed a deep supervision module
